# <code>{{ $frontmatter.title }}</code> for core

<div class='command-title'>{{ $frontmatter.core }}</div>

## Signature

`> ignore {flags} `

## Input/output types:

| input | output  |
| ----- | ------- |
| any   | nothing |

## Examples

Ignore the output of an echo command

```nu
> echo done | ignore

```
